video_prompt: Anime girl in ornate gown. Her large, round, dark pink or magenta eyes widen as her rose-tinted lips part slightly revealing teeth. Her pigtails with orange bows sway as she shifts weight on a reflective tiled floor. The train of her gown subtly billows.
image_prompt: 3D anime girl, full body, front view, light grey pigtails with orange jeweled bows, fair skin, large magenta eyes with long dark eyelashes, rose lips slightly open, flushed pink cheeks. Wearing an ornate, dark blue high-low gown with ruffled sleeves, off-shoulder neckline, white lace and snowflake appliques, and orange jeweled bows (bust, knees, train). Dark blue jeweled choker, orange dangling earrings, silver bracelet, silver ring, orange jeweled thigh garters. Knee-high orange lace-up boots with white laces and orange bows. Standing on reflective light-tiled floor. Soft light orange and pink gradient background with clouds. "c29" in metallic silver in bottom right. Highly detailed, charming fantasy aesthetic.
refined_video_prompt: Eyes widen. Lips part slightly, revealing teeth. Pigtails sway as she shifts weight. Her gown's train subtly billows. Reflections on the floor alter with her movements.
